response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your productivity and satisfaction. Given its unique features and benefits, I think it's worth more than its face value. Considering its intrinsic value and potential impact on your life, I am offering it to you for $200. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value I believe it can bring to you. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 200}
